posts.title: Asian Foodie in Gdansk, Poland
posts.text: I have been staying here in Gdansk for more than 3months already. There are some Asian food selling in local supermarkets here. However, not all of them are good. This post will be showing some of them that I have tried and commenting them. NoodlesMakaron pszenny, świeży-Udon From: Korea Comment: After cooking in soup (3min by instruction), the taste of Udon and soup become sour. It happens usually when it is “BAD” udon. Besides, it is difficult to separate the Udon during cooking without breaking it. If you really miss Asian Udon, go for it, else, you might find better choices. (Haven’t tried stir-fry way yet) Sauces Spices Will be udating this post from time to time.

posts.title: Build a blog with HEXO and GitHub Page
posts.text: Why am I Doing This?Recent years, wordpress has been changed so much that it does not look like a blogging CMS anymore. Hence, I was looking for alternative that can replace wordpress in blogging feature. After two days googling, I decided to use HEXO + GitHub Page to build my personal blog. Choosing Static Site GeneratorI have compared HEXO, Hugo, Jekyll and some other static site generators. Here are some reasons why I choose HEXO. Why HEXO HEXO Hugo Jekyll Setup Easy Easy A bit more difficult (Ruby) Speed Fast Super Fast Slow Theme Nice Enough Not many choices Many Price Free Free Free Difficult of Finding Solution OK Hard Easy

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
